metadata.title: CVE-2022-36402 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - high
metadata.description:
An integer overflow vulnerability was found in vmwgfx driver indrivers/gpu/vmxgfx/vmxgfx_execbuf.c in GPU component of Linux kernel withdevice file '/dev/dri/renderD128 (or Dxxx)'. This flaw allows a localattacker with a user account on the system to gain privilege, causing adenial of service(DoS).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-36402` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic-64k - 6.8.0-31.31
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-aws - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required
